document_data.name: Holy Symbol
document_data.mainbody: '''''Holy symbol''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: A shugenja used this spell to create a holy symbol of their [[deity]] from a mundane item. The chosen item was required to be made by an appropriate material, and the shugenja was only able to make a holy symbol of their own deity. Depending on the [[alignment]] of the shugenja, the holy symbol radiated evil or good.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]].
